name: Cleave
text: You can strike two adjacent foes with a single swing.
prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.
benefit: As a standard action, you can make a single attack at your full base attack bonus against a foe within reach. If you hit, you deal damage normally and can make an additional attack (using your full base attack bonus) against a foe that is adjacent to the first and also within reach. You can only make one additional attack per round with this feat. When you use this feat, you take a –2 penalty to your Armor Class until your next turn.
staminaText: When using the Cleave or Great Cleave feat, you can spend 4 stamina points to negate the –2 penalty to Armor Class until your next turn.
mythicText: You can cleave any foe within your reach.
mythicBenefit: Whenever you use Cleave or Great Cleave, one of your attacks can be made against a foe that is within your reach, but not adjacent to the foe you attacked. You can expend one use of mythic power when you use Cleave or Great Cleave to continue making attacks against foes within your reach, regardless of their position, as long as you continue to hit each foe. You can’t use this ability to attack a foe more than once per round.
text_zh: 你挥动一次武器，命中两个相邻的敌人。
benefit_zh: 每轮1次，以一个标准动作，你可以对攻击范围内的一个敌人以最高BAB进行一次攻击。若命中，在正常伤害的同时，你还能对攻击范围内、与其相邻的另一敌人再进行一次最高BAB攻击。若你这么做，在你下轮动作之前，会遭受AC-2的惩罚。
mythicText_zh: 你能够顺势劈砍触及中的任何敌人。
mythicBenefit_zh: 每当你使用顺势斩（Cleave）或大顺势斩（Great Cleave）时，你的其中一次攻击能够对抗在你触及范围的任何1名敌人，但是不能是与你攻击过的敌人相邻的敌人。当你使用顺势斩或大顺势斩时，能够花费1次神话之力，无论敌人的位置为何，只要你能够持续命中每名敌人，就能够继续对处于你的触及范围内的敌人进行攻击。你无法使用该能力攻击1名敌人的次数超过每轮1次。
staminaText_zh: 在使用顺劈或大顺劈时花费4点耐力可消除AC惩罚。
